# Unnati Foundation Bhandara - Next.js Project

## Project Setup Progress

- [x] Verify copilot-instructions.md created
- [x] Clarify project requirements
- [x] Scaffold Next.js project
- [x] Customize with Unnati Foundation content
- [x] Install required extensions (none needed)
- [ ] Compile and verify build (run `npm install` then `npm run build`)
- [ ] Create and run dev task (run `npm run dev`)
- [x] Complete documentation

## Project Details

**Organization:** UNNATI BAHUUDDESHIYA KALYANKARI SAMAJIK SANSHTA BHANDARA
**Short Name:** Unnati Foundation Bhandara
**Location:** Dr. Ambedkar Ward, Behind Z.P. School, Ganeshpur, Bhandara, Maharashtra - 441904
**Contact:** +91 9579076970, unnati.foundation2011@gmail.com

**Tech Stack:**
- Next.js 14 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Framer Motion
- Lucide React icons

**Design:**
- Color scheme: Orange/Purple (different from JSKST green/amber)
- Focus: Community welfare, education, women empowerment, rural development
- Similar structure to JSKST but with distinct branding and content
